title: Police issues warning over Hartal movement
body_lines: Police said Intelligence has revealed that certain groups had threatened those who did not want to join the Hartal movement and forced them not to open businesses.
Senior Police Spokesman Ajith Rohana said that law will be strictly enforced against those who engage in such activities.
He said the police respect the rights granted to the people by the Constitution to engage in protests and Hartal in a peaceful manner.
The Police urged Trade Unions, Student Movement groups and other organizations to engage in such activities without causing inconvenience to others and by respecting the law in the country.
